name: Bored keeper card game
description:
You are an old dungeon keeper of ancient temple full of gold and treasures. Old and bored enough to create your own card game, every card of it call's to your memories and expirience. Does your skills still tough enough to keep playing this your own game?

!!!Warning!!! We have unexpected problems with clicking sound after each card in web version. If it's makes you uncomfortable, please, download desctop version.

We are sorry about problems with sound.

Controls:

Left click card at your hand ( right of your screen) to choose card. (choosen card wont follow cursor).

Left click slot at first row to place choosen card.

Right click to drop card back in your hand. 

Point card with cursor to view details of it's property.

Credits:

Art: lamorton.itch.io/ & datri.itch.io/

Programming: bimmka.itch.io/

Game desing: tmnkira.itch.io/

Music: bensound.com

Sound effects: soundbible.com

3D Models: cgtrader.com & turbosquid.com

Игра была разработана во время участия в Indie Varvar's Jam #1
